## Checklist

### Code Quality
- [ ] Code follows project style guidelines
- [ ] Self-review completed
- [ ] Code is well-commented, particularly in complex areas
- [ ] No debugging code or console.logs left in
- [ ] Linting passes without errors

### Documentation
- [ ] Documentation updated (README, comments, etc.)
- [ ] CHANGELOG.md updated (if applicable)
- [ ] JSDoc/TSDoc comments added for new functions
- [ ] Technical specifications updated (if applicable)

### Testing
- [ ] New tests added for new functionality
- [ ] All existing tests pass
- [ ] Edge cases considered and tested
- [ ] Error handling tested

### Security
- [ ] No secrets or credentials committed
- [ ] Security best practices followed
- [ ] Dependencies reviewed for vulnerabilities
- [ ] Input validation implemented where needed
- [ ] Only testnet/development credentials used

### Smart Contracts (if applicable)
- [ ] Follows OpenZeppelin standards
- [ ] Gas optimization considered
- [ ] Events emitted for state changes
- [ ] Access control properly implemented
- [ ] Tested on testnet

### Performance
- [ ] No performance regressions
- [ ] Optimizations considered
- [ ] Load testing completed (if applicable)

### Deployment
- [ ] Changes are backward compatible
- [ ] Environment variables documented
- [ ] Deployment steps documented (if needed)
- [ ] Vercel deployment tested (if applicable)
